title: Papers: Arsenal lead Man Utd in race for Tielemans
shortDescription: All the top stories and transfer rumours from Sunday's national newspapers...

title: Gascoigne scores in Rangers Legends match
shortDescription: Paul Gascoigne scored as Rangers Legends took on a World XI to help celebrate the club's 150th anniversary and raise money for Luis Figo's foundation

title: Southgate on Kane: 'He can break record in the World Cup final!'
shortDescription: Gareth Southgate believes it is only a matter of time before Harry Kane becomes England's all-time leading scorer.

title: 'It was perfect' - Eriksen scores with first touch on Denmark return
shortDescription: Christian Eriksen scored within two minutes of his return to the Denmark national team, rifling home after coming on as a substitute against the Netherlands.

title: Eriksen scores with first touch on Denmark return!
shortDescription: Christian Eriksen scores with his first touch, making it a dream return to international football following his cardiac arrest during Euro 2020.

title: Shaw: I feel wanted with England
shortDescription: Luke Shaw says that feeling 'wanted' is a factor in his England form after a difficult season with Manchester United.

title: Gerrard scores for Liverpool vs Barca Legends!
shortDescription: Highlights of the charity match between Liverpool and Barcelona Legends at Anfield. (Pictures: LFCTV)

title: England 2-1 Switzerland
shortDescription: Highlights of the international friendly between England and Switzerland at Wembley.

title: Kelty Hearts crowned League 2 champions
shortDescription: Kelty Hearts have been crowned Scottish League 2 champions after a late win over Stenhousemuir.

title: Kane, Shaw seal England comeback against Swiss
shortDescription: England began their World Cup preparations with a 2-1 comeback win over Switzerland at Wembley Stadium which extended their unbeaten run to a record 21 games.

title: Rep of Ireland 2-2 Belgium
shortDescription: Highlights of the international friendly between Republic of Ireland and Belgium.

title: Republic of Ireland hold Belgium in centenary game
shortDescription: Sub Alan Browne ensured the Republic of Ireland's big day did not end in defeat as his late equaliser secured a creditable draw against world number one side Belgium.

title: England player ratings vs Switzerland: How did the debutants fare?
shortDescription: Check out the England player ratings from their win against Switzerland as Conor Gallagher impresses at Wembley.

title: Villa and Reading share points as hosts end home losing run
shortDescription: Aston Villa finally ended a run of 10 successive defeats at Banks's Stadium by coming back to earn a point against Reading in their Women's Super League clash.

title: Four on Chelsea shortlist | Bidders must commit £1bn to club
shortDescription: The remaining bidders interested in buying Chelsea, including three confirmed by Sky Sports, have been told they must commit £1bn to support the club infrastructure.

title: PL blocks Burnley's bid to bring Moses back from Russia
shortDescription: Burnley's attempt to rescue Victor Moses from the distress of being left in limbo in warring Russia has been blocked by the Premier League.

title: Papers: Real Madrid's Bale to make decision on long-term future
shortDescription: All the top stories and transfer rumours from Saturday's national newspapers...

title: Messi on his future: Many things will change after World Cup
shortDescription: Lionel Messi says he will reconsider his future in football later this year but said it is likely “many things will change” after the 2022 World Cup.

title: France 2-1 Ivory Coast
shortDescription: Highlights of the international friendly match between France and Ivory Coast.

title: England U21 4-1 Andorra U21
shortDescription: Highlights of the UEFA Under-21 Championship qualifier between England and Andorra.
